content: the archer scrap yarn bag is a fun quick and beautiful messenger bag / fanny pack with adjustable sizes for both bag and shoulder strap **this is the crochet version a knitted version is also available for free ** you can choose to make it using scrap yarns and destashing your hoard i see you yarn goblin this pattern is perfect for beginners crocheters as it s worked flat has easy construction is gender-neutral comes with written instructions as well as photos and can be adjusted to your needs it comes with a captioned video tutorial on yt overview language - english & italian level - beginner techniques used - chain single_crochet blo increase decrease decrease slip_stitch there is not the need to check gauge or swatch for this pattern you ll measure it following the instructions materials required yarn worsted or scrap yarns held together approximately 170-230gr of yarn depending on how big you want your bag and how long you want your shoulder straps more yarn might be needed tools required 5mm crochet hook some scrap yarn in a contrasting colour tapestry needle scissors this pattern is written and created by nene from @neneedle and has not be pattern tested please allow for human errors as they are inevitable please contact me if you have any questions or concerns i d be more than happy to answer your questions this pattern is available for free please share it with whoever you like + you are allowed to sell your creations made using this pattern please tag me in your photos we d love to see your creations happy crocheting nene ^
